summary.en: Early in the pandemic, the Norwegian government made it a punishable offence to spend the night at your own cabin. Using the backlash threshold from the Dictator’s dilemma (Francisco, 2005), we explore how participants construct the push-back to this cabin ban when interviewed at different time points in the pandemic.

title.en: The Norwegian cabin ban: The dictator’s dilemma in Covid-19 communication

event.name: The 22nd Conference on Social and Community Psychology
